pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `region` ( `id` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `region` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `region_full` varchar(66) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `address_region` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=27 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 PACK_KEYS=1;
